intro: Elatostema siyuanwukouense, commonly known as the Siyuanwukou elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the Yunnan province. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves with a hairy surface and clusters of tiny, greenish-white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
